attributes.action: Appoint Alan Shearer as the England Head Football Coach
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I firmly believe that Alan Shearer should be appointed as England Head Football Coach.  He has the passion, drive and enthusiasm which is missing so much currently.  He has been an England football player, indeed an excellent one, so totally understands what is required from his players.  Move over Steve McLaren, England needs Alan Shearer - NOW.

rejection.details: Association Football is a self-governing sport in the UK. Please contact the FA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
